text.headline: 1st Machine Learning Project
text.text: This involved applying machine learning techniques for credit card applications classification to help the banks identify potential default clients

text.headline: My Introduction to Data Science
text.text: This was the time I started off with the LSE's Summer School course Introduction to Data Science and Machine Learning. It covered 12 topics with applications in R

text.headline: 1st Internship at Xiaomi
text.text: After finishing my exchange study at the University of Manchester, I started my first internship at Xiaomi Technology working as a Business Analyst for the global monetization team

text.headline: Mathematical Modelling project
text.text: In the BNU Mathematical Modelling Summer Bootcamp, I worked on the project to construct a pricing model for a digital labor crowdsourcing platform

text.headline: Business Data Analyst Intern at AWS
text.text: Attracted by Amazon's brand reputation, open culture and great work-life balance, I joined at AWS for a 6-month internship supporting the Public Sector and IBD operations team

text.headline: Data Analytics Assistant at BNU Data Center
text.text: In the last period of my undergraduate, I worked as a part-time data analytics assistant for BNU data center, creating Tableau data visualizations to support the internal data platform

text.headline: Research Assistant at HKU Business School
text.text: Under the Covid 5th wave in HK, I assisted the MBA course PMBA6092 Python Programming for Managers and Strategists taught by Prof. Yuk-fai Fong in online mode

text.headline: Prescriptive Analytics Project
text.text: This involved applying a predict-then-optimize approach to minimize the HRM cost while retaining an acceptable turnover rate

text.headline: Mapxus Business Analytics Project
text.text: This involved working on Brand Identification from 360 panoramic images to automate Point-of-Interests(POI) data extraction for Mapxus, an indoor mapping company

text.headline: Data Analyst at BVHK
text.text: In Sep 2022, I started my first full-time job as a data analyst at Bureau Veritas Consumer Product Services, working on Business Intelligence and Analytics under Digital Client Solution Team
